ss_device module¶

class ss_device.Device(pixel_list, directory)[source]¶

Bases: object

The Device class represents a composition of Pixel objects.

directory¶

str

directory of this device’s JV data.

name_to_pixel¶

dict

map of pixel_name –> Pixel object

device_name¶

str

name of this device corresponding to name of directory holding this device’s JV data

mean_XX¶

float

mean of XX (Fill Factor, Isc, Jsc, Voc, or PCE)

std_XX¶

float

standard deviation of XX (Fill Factor, Isc, Jsc, Voc, or PCE)

outliers_XX¶

list

Dixon’s Q_Test outliers of of XX (Fill Factor, Isc, Jsc, Voc, or PCE)

median_XX¶

float

median of XX (Fill Factor, Isc, Jsc, Voc, or PCE)

calc_stat_FF()[source]¶

Calculates Fill Factor statistics (mean, median, Q-Test, Std. Dev)

Tuple
(mean, standard deviation, Q_Test outliers, median) of Fill Factors for this device.
calc_stat_Isc()[source]¶

Calculates Isc statistics (mean, median, Q-Test, Std. Dev)

Tuple
(mean, standard deviation, Q_Test outliers, median) of Isc’s for this device.
calc_stat_Jsc()[source]¶

Calculates Jsc statistics (mean, median, Q-Test, Std. Dev)

Tuple
(mean, standard deviation, Q_Test outliers, median) of Jsc for this device.
calc_stat_PCE()[source]¶

Calculates PCE statistics (mean, median, Q-Test, Std. Dev)

Tuple
(mean, standard deviation, Q_Test outliers, and median) of Power Conversion Efficiency for this device.
calc_stat_Rs()[source]¶

Calculates series resistance statistics (mean, median, Q-Test, Std. Dev)

Tuple
(mean, standard deviation, Q_Test outliers, median) of series resistances’s for this device.
calc_stat_Rsh()[source]¶

Calculates shunt resistance statistics (mean, median, Q-Test, Std. Dev)

Tuple
(mean, standard deviation, Q_Test outliers, median) of shunt resistances’s for this device.
calc_stat_Voc()[source]¶

Calculates Voc statistics (mean, median, Q-Test, Std. Dev)

Tuple
(mean, standard deviation, Q_Test outliers, median) of Voc’s for this device.
class ss_device.Pixel(name, directory, jv_curve)[source]¶

Bases: object

The Pixel class represents a set of JV data for an individual pixel of a photovoltaic device.

directory¶

str

the directory containing`this pixel’s JV data

name¶

str

the filename of this pixel’s JV data

V_to_J¶

OrderedDict

a dict of Bias–>Current Density whose values are represented as strings

V_to_I¶

OrderedDict

a dict of Bias–>Current whose values are represented as strings

current_density_data¶

list

float values of current density data

current_data¶

list

float values of current data

bias¶

float

values of bias data

min_voc¶

float

minimum tolerable pixel Voc to be considered valid

Isc¶

float

this pixel’s short circuit current

Jsc¶

float

this pixel’s short circuit current density

Voc¶

float

this pixel’s open circuit voltage

FF¶

float

this pixel’s fill factor

PCE¶

float

this pixel’s power conversion efficiency

area¶

float

this pixel’s area in cm^2

power_curve¶

float

this pixels power density curve defined as J*V
